key_context.summary: Team is planning a workshop in Week 51 to share detailed 2026 roadmaps across teams to identify collaboration opportunities and align on strategic direction.
key_context.relevance: Critical for cross-team coordination and resource optimization in upcoming year

key_context.summary: New process established requiring new ventures tech to vet all new tooling before it reaches core teams, with NV CRM handling direct outreach for approved tools like Wunderkind.
key_context.relevance: Ensures proper governance and prevents unauthorized tool proliferation

key_context.relevance: Could significantly impact conversion metrics and user experience

summary: New ventures product team is coordinating 2026 roadmap planning, establishing CRM interaction processes, and launching a CVR program while consolidating deliverables documentation with a Thursday deadline.
